channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mamdani’s Millennial Mirage

item.title: Europe reacts to U.S. trade deal, with French prime minister calling it 'a dark day'

item.title: If You Need An App To Rate Your Date, What You Actually Need Is Better Community
item.description: If you have to turn to strangers on an app like Tea for advice about your date, you probably need a better community -- so build one.

item.title: A Delta pilot was arrested on child sex abuse material charges after landing in San Francisco
item.description: Federal agents entered the cockpit once the plane landed and took him into custody.

item.title: Overlooked Details in a Big Beautiful Law
item.description: They may not garner the same attention as the tax cuts or Medicaid reforms, but their consequences ought to be big — and beautiful.

item.title: Trump and JD Vance are on completely different continents right now and they’re still getting peppered with Epstein questions
item.description: Asked about the timing of the US-EU trade announcement and the Epstein case, Trump responded: “You got to be kidding with that."

item.title: Trump Administration’s Deal with Columbia Is Encouraging
item.description: The strategy is a sensible one, and other schools should follow.

item.title: Ohio Joins the Flat Tax Revolution
item.description: Its new tax will be the second-lowest in the country, which is good for the state and bodes well for the nation.

item.title: Canadian Legislation Provides A Chance To Stop Medically Assisted Murder
item.description: Canadian MPs can choose to kill the government’s plan, not the Canadians who are struggling.

item.title: Apple Puts America At Risk By Partnering With China
item.description: Patrick McGee's new book, Apple in China , shows how the most important company in the world sold America out to the CCP.

item.title: Take a Vacation Already. The Pope Says So

item.title: A federal judge just dealt a blow to RFK Jr.’s strategy to defund Planned Parenthood
item.description: Planned Parenthood must keep getting Medicaid funds from the government as it fights attempts to cut off money for its health clinics.

item.title: Trump says Gaza ceasefire needs to 'get going'; EU needs to help with humanitarian crisis

item.title: Thailand, Cambodia reach ceasefire deal to end conflict that displaced 260K, Trump says
item.description: President Donald Trump announces Thailand-Cambodia ceasefire deal reached after talks with leaders, saying, " it was an honor to be involved in that."
